employees.name: Viktor Dmitriev
employees.description: My career profile reveals my ability to successfully fulfill the roles of web application engineer, project manager, process improvement expert and client satisfaction specialist. Whether creating unique enhancements to existing websites in a short period of time, or using advanced technical knowledge to design and manage groundbreaking new projects and initiatives, I have always exceeded expectations by providing the highest levels of expertise, service and professionalism.

employees.name: Petr Stepchenko
employees.description: Full stack разработчик с уклоном в backend. Могу создавать проекты с нуля(проектирование, архитектура) и продолжать проекты любой сложности. Также настрою процессы и помогу управлять командой. Ключевые слова: Remote, Elixir, Ruby.

employees.name: Timur Kozmenko
employees.description: Full stack data scientist, from problem definition to deployment. Interested in applying my innate curiosity to data of all sorts. I will increase KPI of your company through detailed product and user analysis.

employees.name: Andrey Petrov
employees.description: I know how to create applications using Ruby and Python. I'm skilful at and also enthusiastic about back-end, analytics, new product development, A/B hypothesis testing. I prefer pure Ruby/Python so as not to hide realisation behind abstractions. Front-end also one of my skills.

employees.name: Andrei Ezhov
employees.description: I'm interested in eCommerce projects, love to improve conversion rates of forms and landing pages. Make hypophyses basing on data and run A/B tests – this is what I'm great at. Also I'm ready to build content strategy which can actually drive sales

employees.name: Dzmitry Kachanau
employees.description: I focus on marketing campaigns which are covering both acquisition and retention. With deep knowledge of Google Adwords & Analytics I ran various campaigns targeting positive ROI. I’m happy as well to help improve your product, as it’s my strong belief, that without progress on conversion & optimization within the product, there wouldn’t be a great progress on marketing.

employees.name: Natalia Novikova
employees.description: Technical support for advertising. DoubleClick for Publisher is my bible. Traffic ads across a variety of third party. Troubleshoot ad network integrations, finding and solving issues. Experience with Mobile Ads

employees.name: Elizaveta Nikiforova
employees.description: I was working closely with the sales and marketing departments to reach the highest advertising revenue goals in company’s history. Monetisation of traffic, raising indicators for banner advertising, direct sales and strong communication skills are my best friends. Experience of working with agencies, companies and key partners are also included. Due to relocation, at the moment I am looking for a challenging position in the field of sales and business development in Moscow.
